preference.name: Scp0PartMSDDeclRevision_PseudoFolder
preference.preference_description: Specifies the list of properties that can be displayed as a pseudo folder under a node for the ManufacturerPart object. The following child properties are available OOTB: Mat1UsesMaterial Scp0UsesSubstanceCategory Scp0AbstractDeclResponse Scp0UsesExemption
